seo: Spring Cloud Gateway,远程代码执行漏洞,CVE-2022-22947,漏洞检测
seo_en: Spring Cloud Gateway,Remote Code Execution Vulnerability,CVE-2022-22947,Vulnerability Detection
summary: 该插件用于检测Spring Cloud Gateway是否存在CVE-2022-22947远程代码执行漏洞，通过添加、刷新和删除路由来验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is a CVE-2022-22947 remote code execution vulnerability in Spring Cloud Gateway, and verifies the existence of the vulnerability by adding, refreshing, and deleting routes.
